text: Justice Simpson may refer to: *Gordon Simpson (judge), an Associate Justice of the Texas Supreme Court *Robert Tennent Simpson Jr., an Associate Justice of the Alabama Supreme Court *David F. Simpson, an Associate Justice of the Minnesota Supreme Court *George B. Simpson, an Associate Justice of the Washington Supreme Court *Jesse L. Simpson, a Chief Justice of the Illinois Supreme Court *R. T. Simpson, an Associate Justice of the Alabama Supreme Court *William Dunlap Simpson, a Chief Justice of the South Carolina Supreme Court
title: Justice Simpson
